ItemDesc: Upon use, immediately heals one ally by <unbreak>15%</unbreak> of the ally's Max HP plus <unbreak>150</unbreak> extra HP.
ItemBGDesc: A cold snack made with Rye Bread Soda and Moo-Moo yogurt. It is sweet and delectable, full of wheat flavor. At the beginning of the Eternal Freeze, many migrants thought there wouldn't be a need for cold snacks in Belobog. But soon, they couldn't resist the frozen delight. "I often see couples eating icebergs with spoons in front of dessert shops..."
